ResearchProjectDef.label: primitive traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make primitive traps, useful against early attacks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows creation of anti-animal traps. The Thrumbo shall be ours!

ResearchProjectDef.label: trigger traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: A much more advanced traps, with a trigger. Your colonists won't need to worry anymore!
